keyMoments.title: The Great Underwear Chase
keyMoments.description: Franky chases the Franky Family through Water 7 in pursuit of his stolen swim briefs, leading to destruction of buildings and a chaotic scene through the city.
keyMoments.significance: A comedic but pivotal moment that forces Franky toward accepting his dream of sailing with his ship.

keyMoments.title: Launched to Scrap Island
keyMoments.description: Franky is captured by Sanji and Zoro and launched via cannon toward Scrap Island where Luffy will make his recruitment offer.
keyMoments.significance: The moment where Franky loses control of his own fate, pushed toward joining the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Recruitment Bargain
keyMoments.description: Luffy offers to return Franky's swim briefs in exchange for joining the crew as their shipwright.
keyMoments.significance: The critical recruitment moment that will lead to Franky officially joining the Straw Hat Pirates.

bounties.reason: Assaulting World Government agents and being associated with Nico Robin

relationships.description: Franky leads the Franky Family, a group of shipbreakers and bounty hunters loyal to him. They view him as their boss and father figure.

evolutionMoments.description: The Franky Family steals Franky's swim briefs to force him to join the Straw Hats, showing their selfless love for him.

relationships.description: Franky and Iceburg were both apprentices under Tom and share a brotherly bond despite their differences.

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Bounty Photo Disappointment
keyMoments.description: Sanji discovers his wanted poster features a poorly drawn sketch instead of a photograph because the photographer forgot to remove the lens cap. Despite his 77,000,000 Berry bounty, he is depressed about the photo.
keyMoments.significance: A comedic moment showcasing Sanji's vanity and establishing a running gag about his wanted poster throughout the series.
keyMoments.quote: Why is my wanted poster a sketch?!

bounties.reason: Assaulting World Government agents during Enies Lobby incident

reveals.information: First bounty of 77,000,000 Berries with epithet 'Black Leg' but with a sketch instead of photo

keyMoments.title: Nami Questions Her Bounty Photo
keyMoments.description: Nami receives her 16,000,000 Berry bounty with a provocative photo and becomes preoccupied with discovering who took it.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's concern about her public image and vanity.

bounties.reason: Being a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and participating in Enies Lobby incident

reveals.information: First bounty of 16,000,000 Berries with epithet 'Cat Burglar'

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper's Humiliatingly Low Bounty
keyMoments.description: Chopper receives a bounty of only 50 Berries, having been mistaken for the crew's pet with the epithet 'Cotton Candy Lover'.
keyMoments.significance: A recurring comedic element showing the World Government's underestimation of Chopper despite his significant contributions.

reveals.information: First bounty of 50 Berries with epithet 'Cotton Candy Lover'

keyMoments.title: Thousand Sunny Unveiled
keyMoments.description: Iceburg unveils the completed Thousand Sunny to the Straw Hat Pirates and delivers Franky's message about the ship's design philosophy.
keyMoments.significance: Iceburg fulfills his role in helping complete the ship that will carry the Straw Hats through their future adventures.
keyMoments.quote: The King of Pirates should sail a ship graced by the King of Beasts.

relationships.description: Both were apprentices under Tom. Iceburg respects Franky's shipbuilding skills and helps complete the Thousand Sunny.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family's Plan
keyMoments.description: Zambai leads the Franky Family in stealing Franky's swim briefs to force him toward joining the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zambai's understanding of Franky's true desires and his willingness to sacrifice their time with Franky for his dream.

keyMoments.title: Begging Luffy to Take Franky
keyMoments.description: Zambai and the Franky Family earnestly beg Luffy to take Franky with them, emphasizing his wanted status and need to pursue his dream.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the selfless love the Franky Family has for their boss.

relationships.description: Zambai is a loyal member of the Franky Family and views Franky as his boss and surrogate family.

evolutionMoments.description: Zambai orchestrates the plan to force Franky to join the Straw Hats, showing his deep understanding of Franky's dreams.
